title: Warsongs

embed.description: Amp up your in-game plays by injecting new beats into classic League tunes. Warsongs is a new collection of remixed anthems to accompany your competitive climb during the 2016 Season, and it's yours to download below.

body: Just gotta say. What an awesome project. How good is track 3 "Welcome to Planet Urf"? Makes me want to benchpress my couch

replies.body:
Would love it if you could select these tracks for DJ Sona {{champion:37}} 

A track select option for her would be great!

The Boy Who Shattered Time is my favourite by far. It just sounds so inspiring and epic.

No doubt a good song for a montage of some sort.

I think my top 3 would have to be

Edge of Infinity (Minnesota Remix)
The Boy Who Shattered Time (MitiS Remix)
Lucidity (Dan Negovan Remix)
When you download the track can you change the in-game music for league?
They're all so good. I think most people will relate to something on the playlist.
The Glory is where it's at for workouts :D
